amerikanu dolar laksha 2 k surayanta pirinamena aasiyanu kusalana siwukon krikat tharagamalawa juni 15 sita 25 dakwa dambaulle di pawathwimata niyamithaya.shashri lankawa samaga pakisthanaya, indiyawa saha bangladeshaya tharaga wadina mewara aasiyanu kusalana tharagamalawe siyaluma tharaga diwa rathri tharaga lesa pawathwe.1984 wasaredi eksath arabi emir rajyaye saja hidi prathama warata aarambha wu aasiyanu kusalana tharagamalawa siwu wathawak bagin shashri lankawa saha indiyawa himikara gath athara 2000 wasare surathawa himiwuye pakisthanayataya.aasiyanu kusalanaye wathman surayan wana shri lankawa pakisthanaye pawathi pasugiya tharagamalawedi (2008) indiyawa lakunu 100 kin paradawa surathawa athkara gaththeya.tharaga kalasatahanajuni 15 - shri lankawa - pakisthanaya juni 16 - indiyawa - bangladeshaya juni 18 - shri lankawa - bangladeshaya juni 19 – pakisthanaya – indiyawa juni 21 – pakisthanaya – bangladeshaya juni 22 – indiyawa - shri lankawajuni24 – awasan maha tharagaya
